column2: he second reason why the first submission of the learned Counsel for the Petitioner

column1: is not correct is in view of the following paragraph of the judgment ‘P5’:

column2: acquiring this land as the public purpose is for a post office and the respondents
have taken steps to establish this post office but they could not proceed further
due to the filing of this application and as the petitioner has not established any
grounds to issue a writ of certiorari to quash section 38 (a) order, Court dismiss
